name: Stairs climber puzzle
description:
Are you good at hyper casual games? Stairs Climber – Puzzle Runner game is here to let you enter a world of thrill, excitement and fun with its fast-paced gaming action. Unending Stairs climbing game is addictive.

An ensured fun of extended periods of time for you!! Attempt to pass every step in this insane endless pathway. All you need to do is to tap and hold, to build a stair to climb. Make sure to build the climbing stair of proper length to avoid the stair smash. Try to climb as high as you can.

Beat your Best Score
Attempt and beat your own record and lift your stats! How? Your lone expectation is to accelerate your score board! But, don’t forget to watch your step. You can choose the character of your own choice to climb & play. This game is easy to play & full of fun. You can enjoy the graphics & can accelerate your goals. Along with the 4 characters of game you can also have the choice of getting game notifications, with facility of playing music on or off from the settings menu.

Easy Controls & Smooth Gameplay
Stairs is an exciting game with endless steps to climb. It is easy to play with simple game controls. Tapping & holding can be the best way to play stairs. Try to build stair of the equal length of step, otherwise stair will bust & you will fall off the step. Gathers coin to open new characters and steps' sort, and go as far as you can.

Test your Reflexes
This is a simple run race to climb up & go higher and higher. You have to control your reflexes to survive which will be helpful in getting to the top tower. The timing is quite important, built stair timely otherwise it will collapse resulting you fall down from the top.

Impossible Journey
Stairs seems like an impossible journey, but it all depends on your strong reflex, making it the fun loving game. You can follow the instructions & can manage to play. Stairs has an easy navigation, with amazing features. You can manage the game sound & notifications pop up in the settings.

Exciting Features of Stairs Climber - Puzzle Runner:
• Collect coins scattered at multiple places in the course
• Simple, easy & instinctive control
• Easy navigation
• Set new records with your hand agility and dexterity!
• Responsive impossible run game design with quick swiping action
• View your game progress, coin count right from game screen
• Use your coins to unlock new super run characters to complete impossible run
• Pay for as long as you want without any interruption
• Coordinate your mind and body

So, what are you waiting for? Are you the next to make new records? Download Stairs Climber – Puzzle Runner & make impossible journey possible!! Bring back the memory of your childhood. Play one of the most difficult survival game.
